about: Experienced Data Engineer, Architect and Leader, with over 10 years working in various data based roles. I have worked across different business domains, from Travel and Retail to Healthcare. I design and build solutions using data to deliver real business value. I have extensive expertise managing cross functional teams, including data scientists, engineers and infrastructure to deliver impactful data products.

I have built and scaled the Data Engineering team from scratch, from hiring, developing team members, and putting processes in place to support the team. I am a hands-on leader, and have strong technical skills allowing me to lead by example.

I have experience working with a wide range of technologies and platforms, and have been responsible for projects to implement Kubernetes on our on-premises hardware, as well as to deploy our platform to Google Cloud Platform.
